name: Ganga Nursery
overview:
Set up in the year 2000, Ganga Nursery has come a long way in being the top-notch manufacturer, wholesaler, supplier and exporter of Ornamental Plants, Flowering Plants, Decorative Plants and many more.

Our Products: The product range includes Decorative Plants like Ficus Panda, Aglonima Hybrid SPP, Cordyline Terminalis, Dracaena SPP, Rabish Palm, Hibiscus Plant, Silverstar Plant, Ixora Sinapuri, Abelia Plant, Clove Tree, Lemon Tree, Psidium Guava, Medicinal Plants like Black Datura, Acalypha Wilkesiana, many varieties of Palm Trees and Ornamental Plants.

Our Motto: Our motto is to give full satisfaction to our customer and ensure quality plants and other shrubs.

Our Quality: Quality has always been the top priority at Ganga Nursery. The best of quality parameters combine with best of brains to result out a supreme range.

Area of Expertise: We hold expertise in decorating and preserving a wide range of plants that is in its full bloom when required. Our team of florists and decorators preserves the plants in their natural look and fragrance. It is made sure that the plants are delivered on time, thereby retaining their original properties.

Opportunity: Ganga Nursery is easily connected with motorable road in the outskirt of A-one city of Kolkata, India. Nursery spreads over the villages of Fultala, Dongaria of South 24 Parganas district of West Bengal encompassing more than 70 acres land with 250 varieties of plants, trees, shrubs, hedges, grass, climbers & many more. Outstation clients may have easy access on the nursery plantation day and night.
